CustomField.formula:
IF( Phone_DNC_Contactable__c = TRUE, IMAGE('/img/func_icons/util/checkmark16.gif','',16,16) & " Washed @ " & TEXT(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),
IF( Phone_DNC_Contactable__c = FALSE && NOT ISBLANK(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c), IMAGE('/img/func_icons/remove12.gif','',12,12) & " Washed @" & TEXT(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c),
IF( Phone_DNC_Contactable__c = FALSE && ISBLANK(Phone_DNC_Washed_Date__c), IMAGE('/img/func_icons/remove12.gif','',12,12) & " - But no washed date", "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Phone DNC Status
